title: Grotta Papale
description: The site of a Roman villa situated on two terraces. The modern toponym "Grotta Papale" derives from a partially subterranean apsidal nymphaeum. The villa was extensive, covering some 23,000 square meters and has both a late republican and an imperial phase.

properties.description: 1:150,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 20891
